snippet.title: Chapter 1 Playtest Teaser - Aperture: Salt Mines
snippet.description:
We're proud to announce our closed playtesting release coming at the end of the year!
Here's a small teaser in preparation for our full reveal trailer.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

What is Aperture: Salt Mines?
Aperture: Salt Mines is a community-made modification for Portal 2. Set in the same universe as the original games, descend into the heart of Aperture in the year 1998, shortly after the death of Cave Johnson.

Follow us here:
Discord: https://discord.gg/WTb5X5B
Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/app/1810070
ModDB: https://www.moddb.com/mods/aperture-salt-mines/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/saltminesgame
